10:57 <alex\_ccr> has joined #xwiki  
10:57 <alex\_ccr> Hello  
10:58 <alex\_ccr> I've noticed a very important lack feature in xwiki  
10:59 <alex\_ccr> when we are editing a page and we close the window or use the back button of the browser, there is no confirm box and we lose modifications  
11:01 <alex\_ccr> I was looking for an issue on jira but I didn't know what keywords using

15:04 <alex\_ccr> thank you woshilapin, it was XWIKI-11526  ;)  
15:05 <alex\_ccr> I've another question for someone who could help me  :)  
15:07 <alex\_ccr> I've just added a "navigation panel" in a space, but the arrows before the tree links are only visible when I edit the panel wizzard,  
15:07 <alex\_ccr> When I am on the wiki pages of my space, arrows are replaced by the unicode icon "f107"  
15:10 <alex\_ccr> And yet it seems to be the same font (i've got the "editing" and "viewing" tabs opened to confirm)  
15:19 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
15:26 <alex\_ccr> here is a screenshot : http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/583313CaptureXWiki.png

16:05 <evalica> alex\_ccr: XWIKI-11494  
16:10 <alex\_ccr> Oh thank you so much ! So it's a real bug, not only on my side  :D
